name: yrs2014 greenhouse control app
tagline: yrs2014 greenhouse control app Using flask python RPI nany and arduino
body:
How to install

Requirments

Flask
```
$ cd ~
$ sudo pip install flask
``` 

nanpy
```
$ cd ~
$ sudo pip install nanpy
```

Installing
```
$ cd ~
$ sudo wget https://github.com/GamingTurtle/WeatherTest_YRS/tarball/master
$ tar xzf  GamingTurtle-WeatherTest_YRS-433718b.tar.gz
$ cd GamingTurtle-WeatherTest_YRS-433718b/
$ sudo python StartServer.py
```
Then in your browser navigate to localhost:5000
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
